document_data.name: Graven Larvoldson
document_data.mainbody: '''Graven Larvoldson''' was a [[dwarf]] blacksmith in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} cenutury [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Graven had a workshop in Waterdeep.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], he was kidnapped and taken to [[Undermountain]] by the [[vampire]] [[Dayan]], who ordered him to create the receptacles Dayan used to hold his life force when he turned to mist. After finishing the work, Graven was left in his cell to die.
